name: Shotgun Tennis
description:
Shotgun tennis is in very early alpha testing. The game is based around the idea of a competitive tennis game with a bit more spice added with shotguns. Use your 2 shell shotgun to push the ball from one side to the other, to eventually win over your opponents. (Gamepad support for 2 players, Menu navigation support Mouse and Keyboard)

Coming features:

  • Online Multiplayer
  • Options Menus
  • Gamepad accessibility for Menus
  • Leaderboards
  • Special sound effects and animations
  • Powerups
  • Different gamemodes
  • Mac OS Support

-------

If you'd like to support development of Shotgun Tennis please feel free to donate to help get the game completed.
